name: AsAboveSoBelow
description:
Warning: at the start there's a loud sound I was unable to suppress, turn the volume down for about 3 seconds.

In As Above, So Below the worlds are the same but influenced more or less by their surroundings, one might suggest good and evil, or simply dark and light, you be the judge! Yeah lame I know, the theme is the same name as the game. 

Both CyberDog(Above World) 'K-9' and CyberTripod(Below World) 'C3 B-Lo' begin in the same place and Dog is on a difficult journey,  knowing he can utilise his alter-ego change to pass through some difficult areas possibly if things get tough to navigate, but maybe more danger lurks below!

Good luck on the journey. It's reaaaaaaaly loooo....., short.

Careful of in-game bug, I mean really.
